com.quantcomponents.chart
Class Chart<A,O>

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
          org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
              org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
                  com.quantcomponents.chart.Chart<A,O>
Type Parameters:
A - type of the chart abscissa
O - type of the chart ordinate
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
public abstract class Chart<A,O>
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite

Base class for charts. Implementors must:

    write the method updateMetrics(IChartMetrics), which is called at each paint iteration to update the metrics
  • add their IDrawable objects to the list returned by getDrawables()
The chart will in turn call IDrawable.draw(IChartMetrics, org.eclipse.swt.graphics.GC) on each of them according to their position in the list.
